00045 typedef double                  Real;
00046 
00047 template<typename T> class      TProb;
00048 
00050 typedef TProb<Real>             Prob;

00058 template <typename T> class TProb {
00059     private:
00061         std::vector<T> _p;
00062 
00063     public:
00065 
00069         typedef enum { NORMPROB, NORMLINF } NormType;
00071 
00077         typedef enum { DISTL1, DISTLINF, DISTTV, DISTKL } DistType;
00078         
00080         TProb() : _p() {}
00081         
00083         explicit TProb( size_t n ) : _p(std::vector<T>(n, 1.0 / n)) {}
00084         
00086         TProb( size_t n, Real p ) : _p(n, (T)p) {}
00087         
00089         TProb( size_t n, const Real* p ) : _p(p, p + n ) {}
00090         
00092         const std::vector<T> & p() const { return _p; }
00093 
00095         std::vector<T> & p() { return _p; }
00096         
00098         T operator[]( size_t i ) const { 
00099 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00100             return _p.at(i);
00101 #else
00102             return _p[i];
00103 #endif
00104         }
00105         
00107         T& operator[]( size_t i ) { return _p[i]; }
00108 
00110         TProb<T> & fill(T x) { 
00111             std::fill( _p.begin(), _p.end(), x );
00112             return *this;
00113         }
00114 
00116         TProb<T> & randomize() { 
00117             std::generate(_p.begin(), _p.end(), rnd_uniform);
00118             return *this;
00119         }
00120 
00122         size_t size() const {
00123             return _p.size();
00124         }
00125 
00127         TProb<T>& makeZero( Real epsilon ) {
00128             for( size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++ )
00129                 if( fabs(_p[i]) < epsilon )
00130                     _p[i] = 0;
00131             return *this;
00132         }
00133 
00135         TProb<T>& makePositive (Real epsilon) {
00136             for( size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++ )
00137                 if( (0 < (Real)_p[i]) && ((Real)_p[i] < epsilon) )
00138                     _p[i] = epsilon;
00139             return *this;
00140         }
00141 
00143         TProb<T>& operator*= (T x) {
00144             std::transform( _p.begin(), _p.end(), _p.begin(), std::bind2nd( std::multiplies<T>(), x) );
00145             return *this;
00146         }
00147 
00149         TProb<T> operator* (T x) const {
00150             TProb<T> prod( *this );
00151             prod *= x;
00152             return prod;
00153         }
00154 
00156         TProb<T>& operator/= (T x) {
00157 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00158             assert( x != 0.0 );
00159 #endif
00160             std::transform( _p.begin(), _p.end(), _p.begin(), std::bind2nd( std::divides<T>(), x ) );
00161             return *this;
00162         }
00163 
00165         TProb<T> operator/ (T x) const {
00166             TProb<T> quot( *this );
00167             quot /= x;
00168             return quot;
00169         }
00170 
00172         TProb<T>& operator+= (T x) {
00173             std::transform( _p.begin(), _p.end(), _p.begin(), std::bind2nd( std::plus<T>(), x ) );
00174             return *this;
00175         }
00176 
00178         TProb<T> operator+ (T x) const {
00179             TProb<T> sum( *this );
00180             sum += x;
00181             return sum;
00182         }
00183 
00185         TProb<T>& operator-= (T x) {
00186             std::transform( _p.begin(), _p.end(), _p.begin(), std::bind2nd( std::minus<T>(), x ) );
00187             return *this;
00188         }
00189 
00191         TProb<T> operator- (T x) const {
00192             TProb<T> diff( *this );
00193             diff -= x;
00194             return diff;
00195         }
00196 
00198         bool operator<= (const TProb<T> & q) const {
00199 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00200             assert( size() == q.size() );
00201 #endif
00202             for( size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++ )
00203                 if( !(_p[i] <= q[i]) )
00204                     return false;
00205             return true;
00206         }
00207 
00209         TProb<T>& operator*= (const TProb<T> & q) {
00210 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00211             assert( size() == q.size() );
00212 #endif
00213             std::transform( _p.begin(), _p.end(), q._p.begin(), _p.begin(), std::multiplies<T>() );
00214             return *this;
00215         }
00216         
00218         TProb<T> operator* (const TProb<T> & q) const {
00219 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00220             assert( size() == q.size() );
00221 #endif
00222             TProb<T> prod( *this );
00223             prod *= q;
00224             return prod;
00225         }
00226 
00228         TProb<T>& operator+= (const TProb<T> & q) {
00229 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00230             assert( size() == q.size() );
00231 #endif
00232             std::transform( _p.begin(), _p.end(), q._p.begin(), _p.begin(), std::plus<T>() );
00233             return *this;
00234         }
00235         
00237         TProb<T> operator+ (const TProb<T> & q) const {
00238 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00239             assert( size() == q.size() );
00240 #endif
00241             TProb<T> sum( *this );
00242             sum += q;
00243             return sum;
00244         }
00245         
00247         TProb<T>& operator-= (const TProb<T> & q) {
00248 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00249             assert( size() == q.size() );
00250 #endif
00251             std::transform( _p.begin(), _p.end(), q._p.begin(), _p.begin(), std::minus<T>() );
00252             return *this;
00253         }
00254         
00256         TProb<T> operator- (const TProb<T> & q) const {
00257 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00258             assert( size() == q.size() );
00259 #endif
00260             TProb<T> diff( *this );
00261             diff -= q;
00262             return diff;
00263         }
00264 
00266         TProb<T>& operator/= (const TProb<T> & q) {
00267 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00268             assert( size() == q.size() );
00269 #endif
00270             for( size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++ ) {
00271                 if( q[i] == 0.0 )
00272                     _p[i] = 0.0;
00273                 else
00274                     _p[i] /= q[i];
00275             }
00276             return *this;
00277         }
00278         
00280         TProb<T>& divide (const TProb<T> & q) {
00281 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00282             assert( size() == q.size() );
00283 #endif
00284             std::transform( _p.begin(), _p.end(), q._p.begin(), _p.begin(), std::divides<T>() );
00285             return *this;
00286         }
00287         
00289         TProb<T> operator/ (const TProb<T> & q) const {
00290 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00291             assert( size() == q.size() );
00292 #endif
00293             TProb<T> quot( *this );
00294             quot /= q;
00295             return quot;
00296         }
00297 
00299         TProb<T> inverse(bool zero = false) const {
00300             TProb<T> inv;
00301             inv._p.reserve( size() );
00302             if( zero )
00303                 for( size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++ )
00304                     inv._p.push_back( _p[i] == 0.0 ? 0.0 : 1.0 / _p[i] );
00305             else
00306                 for( size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++ ) {
00307 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00308                     assert( _p[i] != 0.0 );
00309 #endif
00310                     inv._p.push_back( 1.0 / _p[i] );
00311                 }
00312             return inv;
00313         }
00314 
00316         TProb<T>& operator^= (Real a) {
00317             if( a != 1.0 )
00318                 std::transform( _p.begin(), _p.end(), _p.begin(), std::bind2nd( std::ptr_fun<T, Real, T>(std::pow), a) );
00319             return *this;
00320         }
00321 
00323         TProb<T> operator^ (Real a) const {
00324             TProb<T> power(*this);
00325             power ^= a;
00326             return power;
00327         }
00328 
00330         TProb<T> sgn() const {
00331             TProb<T> x;
00332             x._p.reserve( size() );
00333             for( size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++ ) {
00334                 T s = 0;
00335                 if( _p[i] > 0 )
00336                     s = 1;
00337                 else if( _p[i] < 0 )
00338                     s = -1;
00339                 x._p.push_back( s );
00340             }
00341             return x;
00342         }
00343 
00345         TProb<T> abs() const {
00346             TProb<T> x;
00347             x._p.reserve( size() );
00348             for( size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++ )
00349                 x._p.push_back( _p[i] < 0 ? (-p[i]) : p[i] );
00350             return x;
00351         }
00352 
00354         const TProb<T>& takeExp() {
00355             std::transform( _p.begin(), _p.end(), _p.begin(),  std::ptr_fun<T, T>(std::exp) );
00356             return *this;
00357         }
00358 
00360         const TProb<T>& takeLog() {
00361             std::transform( _p.begin(), _p.end(), _p.begin(),  std::ptr_fun<T, T>(std::log) );
00362             return *this;
00363         }
00364 
00366         const TProb<T>& takeLog0()  {
00367             for( size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++ )
00368                _p[i] = ( (_p[i] == 0.0) ? 0.0 : std::log( _p[i] ) );
00369             return *this;
00370         }
00371 
00373         TProb<T> exp() const {
00374             TProb<T> e(*this);
00375             e.takeExp();
00376             return e;
00377         }
00378 
00380         TProb<T> log() const {
00381             TProb<T> l(*this);
00382             l.takeLog();
00383             return l;
00384         }
00385 
00387         TProb<T> log0() const {
00388             TProb<T> l0(*this);
00389             l0.takeLog0();
00390             return l0;
00391         }
00392 
00394         friend Real dist( const TProb<T> &p, const TProb<T> &q, DistType dt ) {
00395 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00396             assert( p.size() == q.size() );
00397 #endif
00398             Real result = 0.0;
00399             switch( dt ) {
00400                 case DISTL1:
00401                     for( size_t i = 0; i < p.size(); i++ )
00402                         result += fabs((Real)p[i] - (Real)q[i]);
00403                     break;
00404                     
00405                 case DISTLINF:
00406                     for( size_t i = 0; i < p.size(); i++ ) {
00407                         Real z = fabs((Real)p[i] - (Real)q[i]);
00408                         if( z > result )
00409                             result = z;
00410                     }
00411                     break;
00412 
00413                 case DISTTV:
00414                     for( size_t i = 0; i < p.size(); i++ )
00415                         result += fabs((Real)p[i] - (Real)q[i]);
00416                     result *= 0.5;
00417                     break;
00418 
00419                 case DISTKL:
00420                     for( size_t i = 0; i < p.size(); i++ ) {
00421                         if( p[i] != 0.0 )
00422                             result += p[i] * (std::log(p[i]) - std::log(q[i]));
00423                     }
00424             }
00425             return result;
00426         }
00427 
00429         T totalSum() const {
00430             T Z = std::accumulate( _p.begin(),  _p.end(), (T)0 );
00431             return Z;
00432         }
00433 
00435         T maxAbs() const {
00436             T Z = 0;
00437             for( size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++ ) {
00438                 Real mag = fabs( (Real) _p[i] );
00439                 if( mag > Z )
00440                     Z = mag;
00441             }
00442             return Z;
00443         }
00444 
00446         T maxVal() const {
00447             T Z = *std::max_element( _p.begin(), _p.end() );
00448             return Z;
00449         }
00450 
00452         T minVal() const {
00453             T Z = *std::min_element( _p.begin(), _p.end() );
00454             return Z;
00455         }
00456 
00458         T normalize( NormType norm = NORMPROB ) {
00459             T Z = 0.0;
00460             if( norm == NORMPROB )
00461                 Z = totalSum();
00462             else if( norm == NORMLINF )
00463                 Z = maxAbs();
00464 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00465             assert( Z != 0.0 );
00466 #endif
00467             *this /= Z;
00468             return Z;
00469         }
00470 
00472         TProb<T> normalized( NormType norm = NORMPROB ) const {
00473             TProb<T> result(*this);
00474             result.normalize( norm );
00475             return result;
00476         }
00477     
00479         bool hasNaNs() const {
00480             return (std::find_if( _p.begin(), _p.end(), isnan ) != _p.end());
00481         }
00482 
00484         bool hasNegatives() const {
00485             return (std::find_if( _p.begin(), _p.end(), std::bind2nd( std::less<Real>(), 0.0 ) ) != _p.end());
00486         }
00487         
00489         bool hasNonPositives() const {
00490             return (std::find_if( _p.begin(), _p.end(), std::bind2nd( std::less_equal<Real>(), 0.0 ) ) != _p.end());
00491         }
00492 
00494         Real entropy() const {
00495             Real S = 0.0;
00496             for( size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++ )
00497                 S -= xlogx(_p[i]);
00498             return S;
00499         }
00500 
00502         friend std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream& os, const TProb<T>& P) {
00503             os << "[";
00504             std::copy( P._p.begin(), P._p.end(), std::ostream_iterator<T>(os, " ") );
00505             os << "]";
00506             return os;
00507         }
00508 
00509     private:
00511         Real xlogx( Real x ) const { return( x == 0.0 ? 0.0 : x * std::log(x)); }
00512 };

00514 
00516 template<typename T> TProb<T> min( const TProb<T> &a, const TProb<T> &b ) {
00517     assert( a.size() == b.size() );
00518     TProb<T> result( a.size() );
00519     for( size_t i = 0; i < a.size(); i++ )
00520         if( a[i] < b[i] )
00521             result[i] = a[i];
00522         else
00523             result[i] = b[i];
00524     return result;
00525 }
00526 
00527 
00529 template<typename T> TProb<T> max( const TProb<T> &a, const TProb<T> &b ) {
00530     assert( a.size() == b.size() );
00531     TProb<T> result( a.size() );
00532     for( size_t i = 0; i < a.size(); i++ )
00533         if( a[i] > b[i] )
00534             result[i] = a[i];
00535         else
00536             result[i] = b[i];
00537     return result;
00538 }
